Package edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.util

Utilities, static classes, and Kotlin conversions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bounds
    Utility class that checks the (x, y) coordinates of two given rectangles, and performs operations on them. This class is beneficial for basic physics and collision detection.
    DebugInfo
    Class that displays simple debug info for ease of debugging during runtime.
    Families
    Utility class that is used to classify multiple ashley entities.
    JMP
    Utility class that defines a specific, unique color palette to be used throughout the game. This color palette was generated through the following link: https://lospec.com/palette-list/jmp-japanese-machine-palette
    Mappers
    Utility class that holds a map for components. This converts an ashley component to it's original class.
    ParallaxAccessor
    Tween accessor that allows interpolation of any parallax component.
    StaticSpriteAccessor
    Tween accessor that allows interpolation of any static sprite component.
    TransformAccessor
    Tween accessor that allows interpolation of any transform component.
    VelocityAccessor
    Tween accessor that allows interpolation of any parallax component.
    ZIndex
    Static class that holds vital information to be used across the project. This is specifically used for Z-indexing across entities and backgrounds.

Package edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.util Description

Utilities, static classes, and Kotlin conversions.
